subject: Lockouts
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. Board of Governors is expected to approve the deal Commissioner Gary Bettman reached with Donald Fehr and the N.H.L. Players’ Association.
snippet: The N.H.L. Board of Governors is expected to approve the deal Commissioner Gary Bettman reached with Donald Fehr and the N.H.L. Players’ Association.
